name: BevywiseIotPlatformSDK
summary: Connect your iOS application to Bevywise Iot Platform using this library
description:
IoT Platform helps you connect your smart devices, collect information and synthesize it to derive meaningful decision. This Mobile SDK helps you build Mobile Application for iPhone, iPad and other iOS based devices. The SDK provides :

Methods to list Devices
Methods to drip down data into each device
FCM integration to drive alerts and notifications directly to your Phone and Tablet.
